        public static boolean addLinesToCSVCustomers​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> rowsCustomer)
        This method is used to add Customers in customers csv file.
        Parameters:
        rowsCustomer - data to be entered in customers csv file.
        Returns:
        boolean if list of data is successfully added.

        Returns:

      • checkIfEmailExists

        public static boolean checkIfEmailExists​(java.lang.String email)
        This method is used to check if email's customer exists in followers csv file.
        Parameters:
        email - customer's email to check in csv followers file.
        Returns:
        boolean boolean value to confirm if email exists.

      • getEmailsVillaType

        public static java.lang.String getEmailsVillaType​(java.lang.String villaType)
        This method is used to get Followers of that Villa type in followers csv file.
        Parameters:
        villaType - data to be entered in followers csv file.
        Returns:
        String email to send mail to.

      • checkIfResortIsBusy

        public static java.lang.Integer checkIfResortIsBusy​(java.lang.String checkIn,
                                                    java.lang.String checkOut,
                                                    java.lang.String villaType)
        This method is used to check the number of busy Villa type in customers csv file considering the check-in and check-out dates inserted by the user.
        Parameters:
        checkIn - check-in date inserted by the user.
        checkOut - check-out date inserted by the user.
        villaType - villa's type chosen by the user.
        Returns:
        Integer the number of busy villas.

      • deleteEmailToCSVFollowers

        public static boolean deleteEmailToCSVFollowers​(java.lang.String email)
        This method is used to delete email from csv followers file if customer was a follower.
        Parameters:
        email - customer's email to delete in csv followers file
        Returns:
        boolean boolean value to confirm if email was deleted.

      • importDataFromCsv

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> importDataFromCsv​(java.lang.String filePath)
        This method allows you to import all CSV data except the first line (which is assumed to be the set of file headers).
        Parameters:
        filePath - CSV file path from which to import data
        Returns:
        the set of records in the csv file excluding the first
